life insurance.translation[0].definition: a type of insurance that someone makes regular payments into so that when they die their family will receive money
life insurance.translation[1].definition: insurance that pays out an amount when someone dies, or, with an ENDOWMENT POLICY,  when someone reaches a particular age or dies
Life insurers will pay a total of $20 billion in AIDS death claims under individual life insurance policies by the end of the decade.
